Name: Short-Circuit
Effect: Modules are ineffective this turn. Crash the Active Player's most recently installed module.

Name: Smokescreen
Effect: Move a single trashed Static to the top of the Server deck.

Name: Feedback
Effect: All players discard 1 card. Active player loses 1 health.

Name: Corp Review
Effect: Reveal the top card of the Server. If it's Data, move it to the bottom of the deck, and Advance 1.

Name: Discord
Effect: Put your hand in your discard pile and draw back up to your hand size.
